name: Sniper Simulator
describe: Play as a sniper","introduction":"Sniper Simulator is a first-person shooting simulation game. In this game you will play a sniper and control a variety of classic firearms for sniper training. Shoot the target to destroy it and score points.

name: SnakeRun
describe:
The best choice among all the running games.","introduction":"*Be careful not to aim at snakes that are longer than you.
*Avoid various obstacles and stay away from your enemies.
*You are not alone! There are other snakes on the road to victory.
*Eating them can extend your race and help you pass the level!

name: Battle Cars 3D
describe: Drive fast,,shoot faster..Race,,fight,win!","introduction":"Players can fill their garage with tanks, each with unique abilities and styles, and can be equipped with a wide range of weapons. The tank is waiting for you! Upgrade, customize, and dominate the battlefield, defeating competitors.

name: Critical Strike Shooting
describe: Critical Strike is a fast-paced modern multiplayer FPS counter terrorist game.Are you a fan of the good old counter terrorists battles? Enjoying online shooters and multiplayer gun games? There is the best 3D First Person Shooter in real-time.Take the part in the vanguard at the battlefield of Crit

name: Rac Simulator 1
describe: Drive on the open road and explore the huge world in a garage full of unique cars. Get straight into the fun and drive any vehicle in the latest free-roam car driving simulator game.
